# samsungcloudplatformv2_gslb_gslbs (Data Source)

list of gslb.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "samsungcloudplatformv2" {
}

data "samsungcloudplatformv2_gslb_gslbs" "gslbs" {
  size = var.size
}


output "gslbs" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatformv2_gslb_gslbs.gslbs
}

variable "size" {
  type    = number
  default = 0
}
```
